channel.title: I just found Mopar and stuff... Help!
channel.description:
Alright I run on windows vista home premium and I have always hated Jagex for taking away Pking for all eternity it would burn in my soul until I stumbled on Mopar... Can anyone direct me to a good server with Pking and help me figure out how to use it and play with others? I really am excited to see if I can PK again!!!!
-mike
Edit: Also I am real sorry if this does not belong here.

item.title: I just found Mopar and stuff... Help!
item.dc:creator: @mike0281 mike0281
item.description:
@mike0281 wrote:

Well thank you! I am finally playing a server with Pking and I am so happy! Thanks for everyone who contributed to this great project!

-mike

Read full topic
item.source: I just found Mopar and stuff... Help!

well first of u need a client well if u have one u need java www.java.com then download… then go to server advertisment and search a server or u can play mine but its hamachi…
